[[inst_hl_ldp]]
==== HL.LDP

*Syntax:* hl.ldp [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw,.neg}><<<shamt>], ->Dst0, Dst1

*Description:* Long (48-bit) instruction encoding.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_ldp.svg[HL.LDP encoding,width=800]

*Uop-Class:* LDA/PAIR

*Compression:* HL48 (len=48)

*Uop-Class payload:* `{"addr_mode": "PAIR", "agu_kind": "LDA", "note": "User confirmed all loads are AGU/LDA", "source": "group_rule", "uop_kind": "AGU"}`
